about_the_game:
Adventure Forest: Rabbit Story invites you to an open-world adventure filled with realistic rabbits and fascinating nature landscapes. The game aims to provide a unique experience for adventure and exploration enthusiasts. In this journey, where you will start by customizing your own rabbit, you will dive deep into the mysterious forests and experience unforgettable adventures.

Starting with the free rabbit given at the beginning of the game, get a chance to earn in-game coins and unlock four other special bunnies. Explore the rich world of the game with these rabbits, each of which has different characteristics. Use your intelligence and skills to survive in this dynamic environment where each player can develop their own unique strategies.



The Story of The Game
The Arrival of the Storm: A long-awaited storm has appeared deep in the forest. Thunder and lightning illuminated every corner of the forest, while the trees bent and bent under the influence of the wind. This severe storm brought poisonous mushrooms from other lands to the rabbit village. These fungi disturbed the natural balance of the forest, causing poisoning of animals and contamination of water resources. As the rabbit hero, you observed the effects of this disaster and began to worry about your village.

Rise of Poisonous Mushrooms: After the storm, poisonous mushrooms spread rapidly, and the animals in the village began to be poisoned one by one. Panic and desperation prevailed in the rabbit village. In the face of this situation, where the water was polluted and the lives of animals were threatened, the village people began to pray to the spirit of the forest. But after this disaster, the forest spirit disappeared. To overcome this crisis, the village elders decided to resort to an old legend: you, the rabbit hero, had to find the spirit of the forest and destroy poisonous mushrooms.



Hero's Journey: The hope of the village people you have embarked on a challenging journey as the rabbit hero. As you move deeper into the forest, you are passing through dangerous roads and fighting with poisonous mushrooms. With each step, your determination to find the spirit of the forest and save your village has increased. You have fulfilled what the peasant asked of you and you should try to complete all the tasks assigned to you. This will increase the villagers' confidence in you and make them feel safe.

Salvation of the Forest Spirit: After a long and arduous struggle, you will have to find the forest spirit. The spirit of the forest will teach you how to destroy poisonous mushrooms and clean up water sources. When you return to your village, you can use the knowledge and powers you have learned to destroy poisonous mushrooms and clean up water sources. If you successfully complete these tasks, the rabbit village will regain its former peaceful days. Thanks to your courage and sacrifice, the people of the village will be saved from this disaster. The Rabbit Village will honor you as the hero of the forest.

Your Character's Swimming Ability
In Adventure Forest: Rabbit Story, your adventures continue not only on land, but also at sea. Your rabbit has the ability to swim in the vast and unexplored wetlands of the game. Thanks to this, it becomes possible to explore hidden areas and find treasures hidden in the sea. This feature makes Adventure Forest stand out not only as a forest game, but also as a rich exploration and adventure game.



The Mechanics of Eating
The hunger mechanics of the game require you to maintain the energy and health of your rabbit. Various food sources can be found in different corners of the forest. Natural foods such as carrots, watermelons and other fruits allow your rabbit to regain energy by filling the hunger bar. Each type of food provides a different amount of hunger points, so which foods players collect are of strategic importance. In this aspect, the game becomes not only an animal game, but also a survival game in which players need to think about resource management.



The Mechanics of Sleep
Sleep also plays a vital role in Adventure Forest: Rabbit Story. Your rabbit needs to sleep when he is tired. Players can return to the house they were originally given, or unlock more houses with new keys that will be purchased at the grocery store in the following stages. Sleep is essential to completely replenish your rabbit's energy level. This mechanic makes the game stand out not only as a village or story game, but also as a challenge in which the player must develop strategies.

Detailed Character Customizations
The character customizations in the Adventure Forest game are extremely detailed. You can customize many different body parts of your rabbit, especially the eye, waist and chest sections. The game's customization options offer each player the opportunity to create a unique character for themselves. Whether you adjust the size or play with different rabbits, your character is completely up to your creativity.

Realistic Survival Mechanics
Survival mechanics such as energy, health, hunger and sleep are the main elements that make Adventure Forest: Rabbit Story realistic and challenging. Your energy drops when you run and rises again when you stop. To manage your hunger and sleep levels, you can eat or sleep using the natural resources around you. Also, conditions such as falling from a height or hunger and sleep falling below zero affect your health. Therefore, as in other rabbit games and adventure games, you need to pay close attention to your life bar in this game.

Vast Worlds to Explore
Adventure Forest offers players a large and dynamic map. Hidden ashanshar, deep forests and lush fields are just a few parts of this map. Players will encounter new surprises and challenges while exploring every corner. Various climatic conditions and seasons make your gaming experience different every time.

In addition, there are many specially developed systems in the game. There are also chests hidden in certain areas of the map in this rabbit game. Finding these chests with your rabbit character will double the excitement of the open world.



Dynamic Task System
There are a total of eight different missions in the game, and each of them takes the player on different adventures. During the missions, you may need to collect various objects, or explore certain areas. In some tasks, you may also have tasks such as repair work and collecting food for the peasant. Each mission makes the story of the game even more interesting and binding.

Advanced Economy and Market System
The economy system in the rabbit game includes features such as collecting gold, opening chests and buying items. Large and small chests offer various rewards, encouraging players to constantly discover new things. Items such as health potions, food and sleep potions, which can be purchased through the grocery system, will be your great help during the challenging moments of the game.

Are you ready to explore, customize and survive with Adventure Forest: Rabbit Story? Take your place in this fascinating world and have an unforgettable adventure!
